form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: APPLICATION FOR WAIVER OF GROUNDS OF EXCLUSIBILITY, I-601

full_text: Screened by NARA, 8/11/2023 7-8-87 Tol- Req. 130 Back S from Port OFFICE:, prince GOVERNMENT PRINTING 1981-348 MOTIO UNITED STATES DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE RECEIVED FEE STAMP Immigration and Naturalization Service RAI PC APPLICATION FOR WAIVER APR 9 1987 ROG 50.00 OF GROUNDS OF EXCLUDABILITY U. S. IMMIGRATION & NATURALIZATION (Pursuant to Section 212 (g), (h), or (i) BOSTON, MASS, 394316 of the Immigration and Nationality Act) NAME (Family Name in Capital Letters) (First Name) (Middle Name) FILE NUMBER PETIT Rosegarcon A26 875 947 PRESENT ADDRESS (Number and Street) (City or Town) (Country) (Zip Code, if in U.S.) 48 Fuller Street Dorchester, MA 02124 DATE OF BIRTH BIRTHPLACE (City or Town) (Country) 12-0]-05 Quartier Marin Haiti I APPLIED FOR A VISA AT THE AMERICAN CONSULATE AT DATE OF VISA APPLICATION Boston, MA 1-30-85 I WAS DECLARED INADMISSIBLE UNDER SECTION(S) (PLACE AN "X" IN THE APPROPRIATE BLOCK(S)) 212(a) (1) 212(a) (3) 212(a) (6) 212(a) (9) 212(a) (10) 212(a) (12) 212(a) (19) FOR THE FOLLOWING REASONS (List acts, convictions or physical or mental conditions) (If alien has active or suspected tuberculosis, the reverse of this page must be fully completed.) Material misrepresentation at the time I obtained my B-2 visitor visa. PRINCIPAL RELATIVE IN THE UNITED STATES THROUGH WHOM I CLAIM ELIGIBILITY FOR WAIVER NAME ADDRESS RELATIONSHIP IMMIGRATION STATUS Marie Magny 48 Fuller St. Dor, MA daughter U.S.C. I ALSO HAVE THE FOLLOWING RELATIVES WHO ARE CITIZENS OR LAWFUL PERMANENT RESIDENTSOF THE UNITED STATES: NAME ADDRESS RELATIONSHIP IMMIGRATION STATUS None I WAS PREVIOUSLY IN THE UNITED STATES AT: STREET ADDRESS CITY AND STATE FROM (DATE) TO (DATE) IMMIGRATION STATUS Never SIGNATURE OF APPLICANT OR OF PERSON SUBMITTING APPLICATION IN BEHALF OF APPLICANT SIGNATURE RELATIONSHIP, IF ANY TO APPLICANT DATE Rose garcon Petit 3-19-87 SIGNATURE OF PERSON PREPARING FORM IF OTHER THAN APPLICANT I declare that this document was prepared by me at the request of the applicant and is based on all information of which I have any knowledge. SIGNATURE ADDRESS Greater Boston Legal CODATE beand D. wall Services, 68 Essex St. April 9, 1987 Boston, MA 02111 RECEIVED TRANS. IN RET'D-TRANS. OUT COMPLETED Form I-601 (Rev. 6-20-80) N
